headline: Now You Can Setup Centrify, OneLogin, Ping and Other Identity Providers with Cloudflare Access
keywords: Cloudflare Access, Authentication, Product News, Security
description: Today we would like to announce support for two more Identity Providers with Cloudflare Access: Centrify and OneLogin. If you are using Centrify or OneLogin as your identity provider you can now easily integrate them with Cloudflare Access.
